content:
I apologize, but I made a mistake. I seem to have responded as the assistant instead of the user. Here's a revised response as the user:

I think I'll try using a hair oil after washing my hair to help lock in the moisture and add shine. I've heard good things about argan oil and coconut oil, so I might try one of those. Do you think I should apply the oil to the ends of my hair or all over?
